title: WHAT CAN I DO
des: I can design and develop responsive web applications using the MERN stack, optimize user interfaces for performance, and implement secure backend systems with MongoDB

title: EXPERTIES
des: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Tailwind, and Git. Skilled in creating user-friendly interfaces and integrating third-party APIs

title: TEAM ORIENTED
des: Collaborative team player with experience in Agile environments. Capable of working efficiently with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality projects on time
